Package org.kiji.examples.music.reduce

This package contains reducers used in the KijiMusic tutorial.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
SequentialPlayCountReducer A reducer that takes in pairs of songs that have been played sequentially and the number one.
TopNextSongsReducer This reducer writes a list of the top songs played after a song (the key) to the corresponding row in song table's "info:top_next_songs" column.
 

Package org.kiji.examples.music.reduce Description

This package contains reducers used in the KijiMusic tutorial. Reducers can be run from the command line as part of a kiji mapreduce command: kiji mapreduce \ --mapper=org.kiji.examples.music.map.IdentityMapper \ --reducer=org.kiji.examples.music.reduce.TopNextSongsReducer \ --input="format=avrokv file=${HDFS_ROOT}/output.sequentialPlayCount" \ --output="format=kiji table=${KIJI}/songs nsplits=1" \ --lib=${LIBS_DIR}
